# Guildhall (Building)
## Overview
**Guildhall**

**Create** 67 Goods, 66 Labor (2,660 gp)

**Rooms** 1 [[Common Room (Room)|Common Room]], 1 [[Kitchen (Room)|Kitchen]], 1 [[Lavatory (Room)|Lavatory]], 2 [[Office (Room)|Offices]], 1 [[Secret Room (Room)|Secret Room]], 1 [[Sitting Room (Room)|Sitting Room]], 2 [[Storage (Room)|Storages]], 3 [[Workstation (Room)|Workstations]]

The headquarters for a guild or similar organization.
